snippet: Julika Rudelius’s “Rituals of Capitalism,” a video at Leo Koenig, shows young adults in moments of self-consciousness and vulnerability that are less personal than they are symptomatic of larger cultural growing pains.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews works by Julika Rudelius at Leo Koenig gallery.
lead_paragraph: Julika Rudelius’s “Rituals of Capitalism,” a video at Leo Koenig, shows young adults in moments of self-consciousness and vulnerability that are less personal than they are symptomatic of larger cultural growing pains.
